transcript:
Customer: Hello

Hello

Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan
Executive: Haan ji sir namaskar. Gaurav baat kar raha tha sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan IndiaMART na?
Executive: Haan ji. Abhi aapse baat hua tha Aniket ka.
Customer: Haan
Executive: To aapne wo not satisfied diya hua hai. To kya issue aa raha hai sir? Ek baar mai jaan sakta hu? Kya dikkat aa rahi hai?
Customer: Sir kya team ne aapke saath?
Mera saath scam hua hai.
Executive: Kya hua hai sir? Wahi mai jaanna cha raha hu.
Customer: Humko business diya hai. Bola hai customer dega. Aisa bol ke mera paisa leke chala gaya. Lekin koi bhi customer nahi diya. Yahi mera problem hai aur isi ke liye hum legal me jayega abhi.
Executive: Okay. Matlab aap bol rahe hai ki IndiaMART se ek bhi business nahi mila hai sir aapko?
Customer: Haan nahi koi customer nahi mila. Lekin jab humko premium diya tha tab bola hum chhe mahine ke liye lene wale the lekin humko bola ek saal ke niche nahi aayega. Achha wo bhi baat chhoro hum ek saal ke liye le liya hai. Lekin pehle baat hua tha customer dega. Customer nahi deta hai. Agar hamara hand se wo kisi ko connect karta hai koi customer ko to humko fake bolta hai. IndiaMART me sabhi fake hai aisa bolta hai sab player.
To thik hai hum wo kuch dino baad hum wo legal case karega. Karke dekhega kaun fake hai kaun real hai.
Executive: Nahi are sir aisa nahi hai koi fake dekho kya hota hai sir aapko bataunga customer. Haan
Customer: Suniye mera utna time bhi nahi hai ki mera mai aapse itna baat karu. Mera 35000 chala gaya na koi bada baat nahi hai. Lekin mai ek baat bolta hu ye bahut aap logo ka bahut bhari padega mera 35000.
Executive: Ek minute ek minute.
Customer: Aap logo ko bahut churna padega.
Executive: Sir ek baat suno. Dekho aapki baat mai samajh gaya. Aapko sales person ne bol ke jo bhi becha ho, aapko sell out kiya ho. Mai wo agree kar raha hu is baat pe ki kuch bhi bol diya. Unhone bola hoga aapko deal kara ke denge ya fir har mahine aapko ek deal convert hogi. Thik hai. But dekho sir aap service use karoge aisa nahi hai ki response nahi. Dekho aap buyer kya hota hai. Buyer 10 online me dekhiye ek minute suniye.
Customer: Ek to suniye mera time waste hota hai wo service use karne se. Lekin mujhe pehle bola tha hum khud ke hand se aapko customer dega. Isiliye aap logo ka ek aadmi hai udhar Nitish bolke wo mere saath connect hua tha. Humko bola hum wo uske hand se bola ki hum aapko customer deke aap humko commission dena. Usme bhi hum maan gaya haan thik hai chalo tum humko business do hum tumko commission de dega. Aisa paisa deke bhi aisa bola usko. Wo bhi hum maan chuka tha. Lekin abhi customer hi nahi deta hai kya ho gaya?
Executive: Dekho ek cheez mai batau aapko ki kya hota hai buyer aapko bhi pata hai online platform hai har tarike ka buyer aata hai sir.
Customer: Suniye iska mai sab kuch jab sab samajh me aa gaya. Ek to aap log customer dhundte hai haan. Kyunki customer milne se aap logo ka ek mota commission milta hai bahut mota. Jaise ki mera 35000 me usko 10000 to minimum mil gaya hai.
Executive: Sir aisa kuch.
Customer: Sir aisa kuch nahi hai sir. Sir aap sir nahi nahi sir target hamara ho ya fir kisi ka itna target nahi hota hai. Sales person ka ye hota hai unko jodna hota hai 4% aap se connect karke IndiaMART pe jod de. To ho sakta hai unka incentive wagera rehta hai koi aisa target base pe nahi rehta hai ki aapko 35000 35000 karwa.
Executive: Sir nahi sir dekho sir mai batau sales person.
Customer: Koi incentive target base pe hamara nahi hota hai sir. Abhi dekhiye abhi abhi dekho dekhiye mera to koi personal dushmani nahi hai aap logo ko company ke saath.
Executive: Bilkul nahi sir mai agree kar raha hu sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi bilkul nahi sir dekho nahi sir dekho hamare yaar mai aap suniye mera aap mera baat suniye aapka baat hum kyu sunega hum paisa diya hai na mera.
Executive: Nahi bilkul aap bilkul bilkul bolo aap sir mai sun raha hu.
Customer: Business nahi hua to kya hua?
35000 ka gali to dega na.
Executive: Sir dekho aapko agar lagta hai gali deke aapko pehle aapko business mil jayega ya aap satisfied ho jao to aap de lo sir.
Customer: Na na na suniye mera baat suniye aapko lagta hai ki nahi nahi aapko agar lagta hai ki 35000 se gali deke aap satisfied ho de lo sir.
Executive: Suniye mera baat suniye gali wali hum nahi dega. Hum legal me jayega agar hamara man karega to hum nikal nikal hi jaake case file karega. Kyunki mera paas sab proof hai sab call recording hai.
Customer: To aisa hone se mera bhi time waste hoga abhi suno mera baat. Abhi mere mera aur IndiaMART aap aap logo ke saath koi bhi matlab personal dushmani nahi hai. Mera yahi baat hai suniye mera yahi baat hai mera 35000 return karo agar nahi return karega to hum aapko business do customer se. Bas that's it.
Executive: Wahi mai bol dekho sir dekho return nahi ho sakta mai aapko bolu koi return hamara aisa nahi ki return policy ho hum aapko paisa return kar de. Thik hai. Dusra aap rahi baat buyer ki baat hum uske liye aap bol to rahe hai sir aap aao batao kaha ka buyer chahiye kitni quantity chahiye hum us pe discuss karte hai aap hame time do hum aapko leads dete hai.
Customer: Unlimited quantity hamare paas maal bahut pada hai aap customer leke aao. Hum bahut aap open to karo sir.
Executive: Nahi sir dekho hum log commission pe kaam hi nahi karte sir. Hame company de rahi hai sir salary already isi cheez ki. Mai aapko ye bol raha hu.
Customer: Customer hone se humko phone karo. Abhi rakho.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer claims to have been scammed.

- No business received despite premium subscription.

- Alleges fake customers and sales tactics.

- Wants a refund of ₹35,000.



Resolution:

- Executive explained buyer behavior on online platforms.

- Executive offered assistance in finding relevant buyers.

- Executive clarified sales incentives are not target-based.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Customer threatened legal action.



Alert (If Any):

refund, scam, legal

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription, legal action, commission
